resources.string: This activity shows the albums in a list. Can be accessed from the main activity only. Pressing on an album will open the songs activity showing the songs in the album!
This activity shows the audio books in a list. Can be accessed from the main activity only. Pressing on an audio book will open the now playing activity and play the audio book.
This is the main activity which presents the choices for the user. This is the launching activity. Every other activity can be accessed only from here
This activity controls and shows the state of the song being played!
This activity shows the playlist in a list. Can be accessed from th main activity only. Pressing on a playlist will open the songs activity showing the songs inside the playlist.
This activity show the songs in a list. Can be accessed from the main activity only. Pressing on a song will open the now playing activity and play the song. Can be accessed only from main activity.
